description.gm:
Ancient Rune Dragon As adult rune dragon, but the area is a @Template[type:burst|distance:40] and the DC is 41.

Rune Archdragon As adult rune dragon, but the area is a @Template[type:burst|distance:60] and the DC is 46.
description.value: The dragon creates a highly reactive rune in a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] up to 60 feet away. Whenever a creature takes damage from a detonating rune while within the area, all other creatures in the area take the damage of the detonating rune (@Check[reflex|dc:34|basic] save). The Catalyzing Rune lasts for 1 minute but can be removed if creatures adjacent to the rune spend two Interact actions.
